short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clearly see all your tabs, no matter how many you have open.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⚫ Move your cursor to the right edge of the window to view your tabs.
⚫ Browse freely. Click, remove, and move your tabs.
⚫ Click the extension icon to toggle the list on/off.
⚫ Tabs list not supported for certain pages, including "New Tab" page.
